tool_description: Provides all recent major headlines from American Federal Politics, from a variety of news sources.
name: Live American Politics News
title: Live American Politics News

api_list.name: Retrieve American federal political news, from a specific news source.
api_list.description: Gets American political news, from a specific news source of the user's choice.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-american-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Reuters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-american-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-american-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-american-politics-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve all recent American federal political news.
api_list.description: This endpoint provides user with all recent American political news from the following sources:  NBC News, NPR, PBS, Associated Press, Reuters, USA Today, The Wall Street Journal, CBS News and ABC News.
api_list.code:
